H0.text: The Grand Old Party or GOP is the name for which political party in the USA. Democratic

H1.text: The Grand Old Party or GOP is the name for which political party in the USA. Libertarian

H2.text: The Grand Old Party or GOP is the name for which political party in the USA. Green

H3.text: The Grand Old Party or GOP is the name for which political party in the USA. Republican

A4.text: The Republican Party, also known as the Grand Old Party (GOP), is a conservative and right-wing political party in the United States.

A5.text: The Republican Party was founded in 1854 by anti-slavery activists opposing the Kansasâ€“Nebraska Act and the expansion of slavery into U.S. territories.
